create_time.description: Create time of the quota rule. A timestamp in RFC3339 UTC "Zulu" format. Examples: "2023-06-22T09:13:01.617Z".

disk_limit_mib.description: The maximum allowed capacity in MiB.

effective_labels.description: All of labels (key/value pairs) present on the resource in GCP, including the labels configured through Terraform, other clients and services.

labels.description: Labels as key value pairs of the quota rule. Example: '{ "owner": "Bob", "department": "finance", "purpose": "testing" }'. **Note**: This field is non-authoritative, and will only manage the labels present in your configuration. Please refer to the field 'effective_labels' for all of the labels present on the resource.

location.description: Loction of the quotaRule. QuotaRules are child resources of volumes and live in the same location.

name.description: The resource name of the quotaRule.

state.description: The state of the quota rule. Possible Values : [STATE_UNSPECIFIED, CREATING, UPDATING, READY, DELETING, ERROR]

state_details.description: State details of the quota rule

target.description: The quota rule applies to the specified user or group. Valid targets for volumes with NFS protocol enabled: - UNIX UID for individual user quota - UNIX GID for individual group quota Valid targets for volumes with SMB protocol enabled: - Windows SID for individual user quota Leave empty for default quotas

terraform_labels.description: The combination of labels configured directly on the resource and default labels configured on the provider.

type.description: Types of Quota Rule. Possible values: ["INDIVIDUAL_USER_QUOTA", "INDIVIDUAL_GROUP_QUOTA", "DEFAULT_USER_QUOTA", "DEFAULT_GROUP_QUOTA"]

volume_name.description: Name of the volume to create the quotaRule in.
